errors.minlength: Length of name should be not less than {{ requiredLength }}

errors.strength: Password should contain at least 1 element of: lowercase, uppercase letter, number, special char

terms_of_use.have_read: I have read and agree to the

hint.label: Hint
hint.text: Put the nicknames and e-mail addresses you use, it positively influences on PDV level.

errors.conflict: A wallet has already been created for this email or wallet address

email_confirmation_page.open: Please enter the code to complete your registration, it is a mandatory step.
email_confirmation_page.sent_to: Confirmation code has been sent to
email_confirmation_page.title: E-mail Confirmation

hint.label: Hint
hint.text1: Store your seed phrase in a password manager like 1Password.
hint.text2: Write this phrase on a piece of paper and store in a secure location. If you want even more security. write it down on multiple pieces of paper and store each in 2 - 3 different locations.
hint.text4: Download this Secret Backup Phrase and keep it stored safely on an external encrypted hard drive or storage medium.

seed_phrase_page.reveal: Click here to reveal secret words
seed_phrase_page.subtitle: Your secret backup phrase (seed phrase) makes it easy to back up and restore your account.
seed_phrase_page.title: Secret Backup Phrase

warning.label: WARNING
warning.text: Never disclose your backup phrase. Anyone with this phrase can take your Decs forever.

seed_phrase_test_page.subtitle: Please select each phrase in order to make sure it is correct.
seed_phrase_test_page.title: Confirm Your Secret Backup Phrase

success_page.subtitle: You passed the test - keep your seed phrase safe, it's your responsibility!

tips.label: Tips on storing it safely
tips.tip1: Save a backup in multiple places.
tips.tip2: Never share the phrase with anyone.
tips.tip3: Be careful of phishing! MetaMask will never spontaneously ask for your seed phrase.
tips.tip4: If you need to back up your seed phrase again, you can find it in Settings -> Security.
tips.tip5: If you ever have questions or see something fishy, email support@decentr.net

success_page.title: Congratulations
